titles.title: Cause Me To Come To Thy River, Oh Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Cause me to come to Thy river, Oh Lord
Cause me to drink from Thy river, Oh Lord
Cause me to live in Thy river, Oh Lord
Cause me to come, cause me to drink, cause me to live.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Cause me to come to Thy Spirit, Oh Lord
Cause me to drink from Thy Spirit, Oh Lord
Cause me to live in Thy Spirit, Oh Lord
Cause me to come, cause me to drink, cause me to live.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Cause me to come to Thy Word, Oh Lord
Cause me to drink from Thy Word, Oh Lord
Cause me to live in Thy Word, Oh Lord
Cause me to come, cause me to drink, cause me to live.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Come to the city where the Lamb is the Light.
Come to the city of God.
Come and partake of the river of life.
Come to the city of God.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Ven a la ciudad
Donde el Cordero es la Luz
Ven a la ciudad de Dios
Toma del árbol y del río y vivirás
Ven a la Ciudad de Dios
